column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Iroh says : " Looks like you did some serious shopping .
#Text=" Iroh says : " To be honest with you , the best tea tastes delicious whether it comes in a porcelain pot or a tin cup .
#Text=I know we 've had some difficult times lately .
#Text=We 've had to struggle just to get by .
#Text=But it 's nothing to be ashamed of .
#Text=There is a simple honor in poverty .
#Text=" Zuko says : " There 's no honor for me without the Avatar .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Zuko ... Even if you did capture the Avatar , I 'm not so sure it would solve our problems .
#Text=Not now .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Then there is no hope at all .
#Text=" Iroh says : " No , Zuko !
#Text=You must never give in to despair .
#Text=Allow yourself to slip down that road and you surrender to your lowest instincts .
#Text=In the darkest times , hope is something you give yourself .
#Text=That is the meaning of inner strength .
#Text=" Katara says : " Mayor Tong , I 'd like for the court to hear one last testimony .
#Text=" Tong says : " I 've already told you , it 's just me and the accused .
#Text=You ca n't call any witnesses !
#Text=" Katara says : " This is n't just any witness .
#Text=I 'm going to call ... Avatar Kyoshi herself !
#Text=" Sokka says : " What are you doing ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Well , she is Aang 's past life .
#Text=Maybe wearing her stuff will trigger something .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I do believe in the power of stuff .
#Text=" Tong says : " This is a mockery of Chin Law !
#Text=" Katara says : " Please !
#Text=If you could just wait one more second , I 'm sure Kyoshi will be here !
#Text=" Aang says : " Hey , everybody !
#Text=Avatar Kyoshi here .
#Text=" Tong says : " This is ridiculous !
#Text=For the murder of Chin the Great , this court finds the Avatar – " Kyoshi says : " I killed Chin the Conqueror .
#Text=A horrible tyrant , Chin was expanding his army to all corners of the continent .
#Text="
